name: nasa-application
description: This is a Full Stack NASA Launch Project Simulator

scripts.install: npm run server-install && npm run client-install
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix Client && npm start --prefix Server

scripts.test: npm run test --prefix Client && npm run test --prefix Server
